spectral_flat.description: Spectral‑flatness class: Z = ultra‑flat (highest clarity)…A = most comb‑filtered (lowest). Single capital letter.

noise_floor.description: Noise floor in dBFS, always negative. Encoded as 'N' + three‑digit value (e.g. N090 = –90 dBFS).

thd.description: Total Harmonic Distortion × 0.01 %. Four digits (e.g. 0015 = 0.15 % THD).

description: Prefix (CLA) + spectral flatness (1) + noise floor (N + 3) + THD (4). Example: CLAZN0900015.
